section.subhead: Upgrading from older versions (0.8 and below)

numlist.list: Download the latest version and extract the archive.
Upload and overwrite extracted files to your server.
If you have customised the default theme rename it or else it will be overwritten.
Copy the database and application sample files from the installer to your new anchor folder. ~ cp install/storage/application.distro.php anchor/config/application.php

section.snippet: cp install/storage/application.distro.php anchor/config/application.php cp install/storage/database.distro.php anchor/config/database.php
